short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your tasks in a simple way within each browser tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser tabs into productivity hubs! Organize your tasks seamlessly within the context of your active webpage, ensuring focused and efficient work sessions. Dive into a task, one tab at a time!
